aircraft.value: Goliath Lift - AC-2396-959 at Sector West Station

defect_observed.value: Brake system pressure decay. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.

root_cause.value: Thermal cycling induced solder joint failure in electronic assembly

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Flight Control Hydraulics component. Physical examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.

corrective_action.value: Repair damaged area using approved repair scheme

preventive_action.value: Reduce inspection interval for affected component type

remarks_investigation.value: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.

remarks_design.value: Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol. Date: 20/02/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. P.L. Mehta

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality assurance review completed. Recommend enhanced incoming inspection criteria for this component type. Date: 21/02/2023 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational history analyzed. No abnormal usage patterns identified. Agree with proposed corrective actions. Date: 23/02/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) From quality standpoint, root cause analysis is thorough. Corrective measures are appropriate. Concur. Date: 25/02/2023 Signature: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) From regulatory standpoint, investigation meets required standards. Approve proposed corrective actions. Date: 28/02/2023 Signature: Dr. P.L. Mehta
